sn42.13:3.5: ca vahātuṃ → tāni ca pahātuṃ (s1-3, km) | tāni vahātuṃ (pts1) | tāni ca yātuṃ (katthaci) | tāni cāvahātuṃ (?)
sn42.13:9.5: pasayha ratanaṃ ahāsi → pasayha adinnaṃ ādiyati (s1-3) | pasayha adinnaṃ ratanaṃ ādiyi (mr)
sn42.13:23.6: upapajjissāmī’ti → upapajjīssāmīti (pts1) | paraṃ maraṇā na upapajjissāmīti (?)
sn42.13:25.10: sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjissāmī’ti → paraṃ maraṇā na upapajjissāmīti (?)
